name: Disney Infinity 2.0
description:
Disney Infinity 2.0 is an action, adventure, fighting and puzzle game developed by Avalanche Software and Heavy Iron Studios. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Disney Interactive.
Disney Infinity 2.0 is available on Wii U, PS Vita, PC and Xbox One.
Chuck E. Myers, Henry Jackman, James Dooley and Kevin Manthei scored the game.
